description: Continued fraction for root of x^5 - x - 1.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
S. Lang and H. Trotter, Continued fractions for some algebraic numbers, J. Reine Angew. Math. 255 (1972), 112-134.
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=NULL; p=x^5 - x - 1; rs=polroots(p); r=real(rs[1]); c=contfrac(r); for (n=1, 20001, write("b039922.txt", n-1, " ", c[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 03 2009(PARI) contfrac(polrootsreal(x^5-x-1)[1]) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 14 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
